Class AbstractCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • heartstone_cc3002_plt.AbstractCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assassin, Druid, Healer, Hunter, Knight, Mage, Paladin, Shaman, Warlock

    public abstract class AbstractCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICard
    Represents an abstract card
